title: Mastering Microsoft Word Essentials
description: Learn the essential skills to confidently use Microsoft Word. From formatting text and managing documents to inserting tables, images, and preparing professional reports, this course equips beginners with practical Word knowledge.

videos.title: መሰረታዊ Microsoft Word ትምህርት - ክፍል 1 (MS Word Basics Part 1)
የMicrosoft Word ፎርማቲንግ እና ሰነድ አስተዳደር (Word Formatting & Document Management)
በWord ሰነድ ሰንጠረዥና ምስል መጨመር (Inserting Tables and Images in Word)
